snippet: Indoor Extreme Sports in Long Island City is a 38,000-square-foot emporium for nonlethal indoor combat, like zombie laser tag.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Indoor Extreme Sports, 38,000-square-foot emporium in Queens offering non-lethal combat games, from laser tag to version of paintball.
lead_paragraph: Indoor Extreme Sports in Long Island City is a 38,000-square-foot emporium for nonlethal indoor combat, like zombie laser tag.

headline.print_headline: A Perfect Place to Hunt the Living Dead
headline.main: A Perfect Place to Hunt the Living Dead in Queens
